title: Why was Hitler allowed to change the Weimar constitution Article 137 '(1) There shall be no state church. (2) The freedom to form religious societies shall be guaranteed.'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hitler convinced the Reichstag to give him ‘Emergency Powers’ after the arson torched the Reichstag building. Those emergency powers allowed him to rule by dictate and change anything and everything to his liking. He ruled by decree after that.
